item.description: Friday night, August 21st, you can catch The Bernadettes at Johnny Ray's Restaurant One of our favorite clubs to play at, Johnny Ray's offers up the glitz of Las Vegas and a hip NYC vibe, along with some fabulous dishes...it has become "the" nightclub in the greater New Haven-Bridgeport area for the over 25 crowd to come out and mingle! Very cool, upscale decor and atmosphere...we always have a blast at this place...people love to party and dance the night away here!!! Showtime kicks off at 9:00...reservations or an early arrival suggested as we usually pull in a big crowd here! Grab your dancing shoes and come on down as this is our only public performance this weekend! Hope to see ya'll there! For more info on Johnny Ray's, visit their website at: http://www.johnnyrays...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the bar.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's @ Johnny Ray's Fri night!!
